Title: My custom zsh theme
Description:
Source code: https://github.com/blueyed/oh-my-zsh/blob/master/themes/blueyed.zsh-theme

zsh-autoenv (https://github.com/Tarrasch/zsh-autoenv) is used to auto-setup certain dirs when changing into or leaving them.

There is also quite a lot of custom detection via vcs_info etc.
